unnormalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra mhunnllear mhojea B.Techachea disanim khup doka dukhi zatali! Maka matrix transformations kodden zhogddonk poddtalem. Prof. Sharman 3rea chapterantlea textbookantle sumaar 50 proxn soddvonk laile, te 12/12/2022 disa zalole porxek toyar zaunk pan, punn satch sangta, mhaka tankanch 40% mellâ€™lle. Mhoji ievnxa asli ki tedna mhaka eigenvectors ani eigenvalues barem zannovnk mellonk zai aslem. Atam tim mhaka dhunvdli-dhunvdli sopnantlim disotat! Kiteak na Khan Academy vaprun tedna mhaka ti concept porthun ekttea disa bhitor somzonk zai; aikotanv te borem sangtat mhunn.
normalised: Arre yaar, linear algebra mhaka mhojea B-Tech disa vellar khupuch tras diitalem! Mhaka matrix transformations kodden zhogddai korunk poddtailem tem ugddas asa. Professor Sharma-n amkam textbookantlean lagbhag pachas prashna, chapter teen solve korunk laile. Bara december don hazar ann twenty two-chea examak toyar zaunk zai aslem punn sach sangta, hanv fokot challis percent-an pass zallo. Mhaka ten'na eigenvectors ani eigenvalues borem zann zaunk zai aslem mhunn dista. Atam te mhojea bhutkallantle dhundh svopna bhaxen asat! Kiteak na hanv Khan Academy vaprun te concepts porot poisunk zai; aikta ki te borem sangtat.
